sentences: In its conclusions (FCCC/SBSTA/2010/L.2), SBSTA: requests the Chair to explore ways to facilitate coordination of activities; encourages organizations and stakeholders to share information on activities on the UNFCCC web platform; and requests the Secretariat to increase the number of experts trained in the use of the IPCC guidance and guidelines and work with the IPCC on promoting the use of the IPCC Emission Factor Database and to enhance sharing of information by establishing a discussion forum on the UNFCCC web platform.
